root.name: Leadfoot: Stadium Off-Road Racing
root.description: PremiseLeadfoot: Stadium Off-Road Racing is based on short-course off-road racing, which takes the vehicles used for desert endurance racing and puts them in a stadium or outdoor track with grandstands for easier spectator access. Although it has no licensed content, it closely emulates the vehicles and tracks of the Championship Off Road Racing (CORR) series. Players can drive trucks or buggies on 12 different tracks, and upgrade their vehicle in career mode.

similar_games.game: Ivan "Iron Man" Stewart's Super Off Road
